## Description

### UIUX Design

[Rong](https://2022.thef2e.com/users/12061549261454740001) [Figma Scrum 新手村](https://www.figma.com/file/jgXAB3432Be71YoY7AWloP/F2E-%7C-WEEK-3?node-id=0%3A1) UIUX

### Planning

-  React
-  TypeScript
-  SCSS
-  react-beautiful-dnd
-  react-uuid

## Building

### Install Packages

```
$ npm install
```

### Start Dev Server

```
$ npm start
```
